SKU364203.Name: Drommen Ivory Leather Bed
SKU364203.Description: Both architectural and comfy, leather bed designed by Jannis Ellenberger is a dream from every angle. Aligned with Ellenberger's style of simple construction with unexpected details, "the combination of contrasting materials and inclining lines make the design modern and fresh." Solid oak finished with a black painted finish intersects angular legs that meet in an open back on a low-profile platform—a natural complement to plush upholstered headboard, tailored in rich ivory full-grain leather. Mattress sold separately. Learn more about Jannis Ellenberger on our blog. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Headboard: Upholstered in full-grain leather with foam padding
Finished back can float in a room
For use with mattress only, sold separately

SKU652417.Name: Andes Acacia Bed
SKU652417.Description: Boutique hotel. Acacia veneer platform scales to new lo-heights integrating headboard nightstands that cantilever two stepped shelves each—one wide for books, one narrow with discreet cord cutouts for clock/light/dock. Just right height for pillow propping. Ledge extends around mattress, hovers over corner block feet. Sized for smaller spaces. Acacia twin bed is substantial in construction, dreamy in price. This kit does not attach a Twin size frame or headboard to a Full size frame or headboard, or a Queen size frame or headboard to a King size frame or headboard

SKU494447.Name: Brentwood Ventura Mattress
SKU494447.Description: Enjoy twice the comfort with Brentwood Home's hybrid mattress – the luxurious comfort of memory foam and the support of pocketed coils. A layer of CertiPUR-US certified gel memory foam regulates temperature, reduces motion transfer and relieves pressure points to help you comfortably fall asleep. Responsibly upcycled steel coils are individually wrapped in fabric to keep things quiet as they move independently to contour your body and provide critical back support. CB2 exclusive.
Features: CertiPUR-US® certified support 8\" 660 foam encased coils

SKU474564.Name: Helix Standard Sunset Soft Mattress
SKU474564.Description: Helix hybrid mattresses combine the best of foam and spring technology. Sunset is the softest model, featuring a top that feels like sinking into a cloud or marshmallow – your call. Mattress features a breathable cover to keep you cool, while specially designed Memory Plus Foam layer is great for both stomach and back sleepers while offering the support needed for side sleepers.

Individually wrapped steel springs with reinforced perimeter for edge support
100 Night Sleep Trial guarantee: Helix mattresses may be returned within 100 days (after the first 30)

SKU474729.Name: Helix Standard Midnight Medium Mattress
SKU474729.Description: Helix hybrid mattresses combine the best of foam and spring technology. Midnight provides a medium feel and is the most popular model. Mattress features top and middle layers developed to give the perfect support, including a Memory Plus Foam layer that's great for both stomach and back sleepers while offering the support needed for side sleepers. Breathable cover and hybrid design keep you cool while you sleep.

SKU474741.Name: Helix Standard Twilight Firm Mattress
SKU474741.Description: Helix hybrid mattresses combine the best of foam and spring technology. Twilight is the firm model: comfortable yet solid with minimal sink or give. Each mattress features a Memory Plus Foam layer that's great for both stomach and back sleepers while offering the support needed for side sleepers. The top and middle layers were developed to provide the perfect support, and a breathable cover and hybrid design keep you cool while you sleep.

SKU182151.Name: Laurel Mattress
SKU182151.Description: Catching some z's never felt so good. Made exclusively for CB2 in California, Brentwood Home's hybrid king mattress brings high-end comfort to your nightly routine. It combines temperature-regulating memory foam that contours to your body, a responsive middle layer of latex so you never feel stuck in one spot, and a stabilizing coil system that offers top-notch support. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Gel Swirl Memory Foam and Charcoal-Infused Memory Foam
Compressed and rolled mattress ships via FedEx
Please allow 5 to 10 business days for delivery

SKU410232.Name: Simmons ® Beautysleep Karlena Firm Mattress
SKU410232.Description: Triple threat. Three layers make for a perfect night's sleep. First, the support layer has hundreds of density wrapped coils and a foam-encased Edge Support System to reduce the transfer of weight and movement from one side of the mattress to the other. Second is the contour layer, composed of ½" GelTouch ® Foam that adjusts to your body for maximum comfort. Finally, the mattress is topped off with a Plush Comfort layer featuring cooling technology, luxurious Comfort Foam and a high-quality stretch knit fabric cover.

Dimentions.productName: Simmons ® Beautysleep Karlena Firm Twin Mattress

SKU108195.Name: Simmons ® Beautysleep ® Low-Profile Box Spring
SKU108195.Description: Thin layer. Same support as a Beautysleep standard box spring with a much lower profile. Non-yielding steel struts create a sturdy mattress foundation that won't bend under pressure. Pairs with our adjustable metal bed frame that adapts to fit a queen, king or California king mattress.

Dimentions.productName: Simmons ® Beautysleep ® Low-Profile Box Spring Queen
Simmons ® Beautysleep ® Low-Profile Box Spring King

Cover is stretch woven fabric with grey sides

SKU529300.Name: Boho Natural Daybed with Pearl White Mattress Cover
SKU529300.Description: Seize the day. The perfect setting for daily siestas. Designed by Mermelada Estudio in Spain, graceful daybed approaches sofa styling with the relaxed comfort of a bed. Subtly whitewashed, solid rubberwood frames airy panels handwoven of natural rattan. Inspired by the Mediterranean ritual of taking a relaxing moment after lunch, the designers reflect, "The straightforward wood structure combines with the lightness of the cane weaving for a fresh, contemporary look. The daybed is really complete when you fill it with a mix and match of pillows." Includes fibercore daybed mattress/trundle with a warm pearl white cotton blend mattress cover. CB2 exclusive. Learn about Mermelada Estudio on our blog. CB2 exclusive.

Dimentions.productName: Boho Natural Daybed with Pearl White Mattress Cover

Features: Each piece will vary due to natural materials of rattan and wood

SKU395015.Name: Curious Chiffonier
SKU395015.Description: Hide and chic. Designed by Mermelada Estudio, the idea was to design a piece with a simple aesthetic hiding a great surprise. Trimmed in iron-plated brass, this acacia cabinet reveals itself one drawer at a time. Flip open the top surface to see your reflection in a mirror. Fold down the top panel to expose multiple  trays made for jewelry and other storage. Learn about Mermelada Estudio on our blog.Head to Idea Central for a brief history of this hardworking cabinet.

SKU253614.Name: Astoria Wardrobe
SKU253614.Description: into the gloss. White wardrobe gleams as haute hideout for clothes and clutter. Designed by Ceci Thompson, steel legs and solid frame support one fixed shelf and removable brass pole for hanging clothes. Opens with suspended brass pulls that remind the designer of "abstract jewelry." Learn about Ceci Thompson on our blog. astoria wardrobe is a CB2 exclusive.
Features: One fixed shelf, one removable pole
Clean with soft, dry or damp cloth

SKU123439.Name: Reflection Wardrobe
SKU123439.Description: mirror, mirror. Well-edited wardrobe by Amanda Ip of Slate Design reflects on a smart use of space. Full-length mirrored panels add depth to the room and provide a head-to-toe view. Stained a deep charcoal inside and out, streamlined construction of beech veneer over engineered wood shows beautiful variation in tone, grain and texture. Behind the looking glass is a meticulously organized configuration: Hanging rod up top; one fixed shelf and two divided adjustable shelves for sweaters, tees and shoes. Ten top hooks park coats, scarves and hats. A must for the bedroom, but also neat in the entry. Learn about Amanda Ip on our blog. reflection wardrobe is a CB2 exclusive.

productDimensions.description: Height From Fixed Shelf To Top

Features: Designed by Amanda Ip of Slate Design
Engineered wood with beech wood veneer
Matte charcoal stain with clear lacquer finish
Interior features hanging rod, one fixed shelf, two adjustable shelves and 10 hanging hooks
Anti-tip hardware is included and recommended

SKU189260.Name: Reflection Bath Cabinet
SKU189260.Description: things are looking up. Streamlined storage column by Amanda Ip of Slate Design gives rise to vertical storage for the tightest of rooms on a compact 14-inch footprint. Sleek mirrored door makes small spaces look bigger while concealing a wealth of meticulous organization within. Two adjustable and two fixed shelves stow towels, shampoo and styling tools in the bath; shoes, hats and bags in the entry; or clothes and extra linens in the bedroom. Stained deep charcoal inside and out, beech veneer shows beautiful variation in tone, grain and texture. Learn about Amanda Ip on our blog. reflection bath cabinet is a CB2 exclusive.
Features: Designed by Amanda Ip of Slate Design
Engineered wood with beech wood veneer
Matte charcoal stain with clear lacquer finish
Interior features two adjustable and two fixed shelves
Anti-tip hardware is included and recommended

SKU338844.Name: Muse Cabinet
SKU338844.Description: inner reflection. Make the most of small spaces with this utilitarian design that keeps everything in its place. Designer Donna Piacenza was inspired to "create an elegant piece that looks great in any room and takes advantage of all corners of the interior." Sleek structure of mixed materials does just that, concealing a highly organized storage space in warm acacia veneer contrasted by an architectural iron base and handles. Double doors hinge open to reveal the unexpected reflection of a mirrored back panel behind two fixed shelves, one adjustable shelf and five handy hooks inside each door panel. We see it keeping clothes and linens neat in the bedroom, dishes in the dining room, or come-and-go clutter in the entry. Learn about Donna Piacenza on our blog.

productDimensions.description: Height Frm Base To Fixed Shelf

Features: Case: Acacia veneer over engineered wood
Base and handles: Iron tube with brushed nickel finish
10 metal hooks with brushed nickel finish; five on each side
Two fixed shelves; one adjustable shelf

Wrapped in kubu rattan, wooden cabinet playfully combines textures and shapes with brass detailing along the doors and cabinet bottom. Makes a statement in the entryway or as an eclectic bar. Learn about Mermelada Estudio on our blog. CB2 exclusive.

SKU208628.Name: Fan Natural Rattan Room Divider
SKU208628.Description: Peekaboo panels. Rattan room divider cuts a sexy silhouette with four fan-shaped panels in light honey finish. Staggered in height, each panel arches upward revealing an open, airy center section. Finished on both sides, divider looks chic from every angle. Learn about Brett Beldock on our blog. CB2 exclusive.

SKU203241.Name: Novus Plastic Polish-Cleaner Kit
SKU203241.Description: always like new. Keep your acrylic furniture shiny and protected. Polish #1 gently cleans without scratching and leaves a lustrous shine that resists fogging and repels dust. Polish #2 is a fine scratch remover. Polish #3 repairs and removes heavy scratches and abrasions from most acrylic surfaces. Must-have with our our Peekaboo and/or Vapor furniture collections.
